plot: A one-hour documentary about the colourful history and diverse practices of Shrove Tuesday, a rowdy celebration of excess before the solemn season of Lent.
title: Mardi Gras: Feast Before Fast
plot_es: A one-hour documentary about the colourful history and diverse practices of Shrove Tuesday, a rowdy celebration of excess before the solemn season of Lent.
plot_en: A one-hour documentary about the colourful history and diverse practices of Shrove Tuesday, a rowdy celebration of excess before the solemn season of Lent.
